# Screen Section Widgets

These are widgets that can be placed on a [screen section](/t/Screen-Sections). These are typically data input widgets or group boxes.

-   [Blob Control](/t/Blob-Control)
-   [Check Box](/t/Check-Box)
-   [Checklist](/t/Checklist)
-   [Color Picker](/t/Color-Picker)
-   [Date Box](/t/Date-Box)
-   [Drop-down Box](/t/Drop-down-Box)
-   [Group Box](/t/Group-Box)
-   [Image Box](/t/Image-Box)
-   [Radio Button](/t/Radio-Button)
-   [TagInput](/t/TagInput)
-   [Textbox](/t/Textbox)
